name: 04_node-package-manager
description: - it's a tool we use to install and manage software packages written in javascript. - you can think of it like the command line version of pip (python) or gem (ruby). - npm packages are node modules that are created by third parties. - they contain code, documentation, tests, and metadata files. - when you run `npm init`, you create a new package with a name, description, version, main file, etc.
author: Subrat Kumar Behera
